Detailed Description

Vertex snapshot specialisation for skinned vertices.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual Moo::SkinnedVertexSnapshot::~SkinnedVertexSnapshot (  )  [inline, virtual]

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Moo::SkinnedVertexSnapshot::fini (  )  [inline, virtual]

This method is called when the delayed renderer has finished drawing.

Vertex snapshot often hold external references to make sure their source data remains in scope until this point.

Implements Moo::VertexSnapshot.

virtual bool Moo::SkinnedVertexSnapshot::getVertexDepths ( uint32  startVertex,
uint32  nVertices,
float *  pOutDepths 
) [inline, virtual]

This method is called by the delayed renderer (within channel) to enable the triangles to be sorted.

returns true if the resource has been updated (so we know if we can the last buffer again or not)

Implements Moo::VertexSnapshot.
